entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING ENDED, Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:19 p.m. EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with periods of snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
